resources.string: People may be sick with the virus for 1 to 14 days before developing symptoms. The most common symptoms of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) are fever, tiredness, and dry cough. Most people (about 80%) recover from the disease without needing special treatment. More rarely, the disease can be serious and even fatal. Older people, and people with other medical conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, or heart disease), may be more vulnerable to becoming severely ill. People may experience: cough fever tiredness difficulty breathing (severe cases)
1. Wash Hands often 2. Cough into Your ELBOW 3. Dont touch Your Face 4. Keep safe distance 5. Stay Home if you can

Self care If you have mild symptoms, stay at home until youâ€™ve recovered. You can relieve your symptoms if you: 1. rest and sleep 2. drink plenty of warm liquids 3. take a hot shower to help ease a sore throat and cough 4. Self-isolate if possible
